excerpt.rendered: Working with WES is simple and requires no contract or commitment. Academic institutions, employers and other organizations refer their candidates to WES for credential evaluation services just as they would for admissions testing or other external services. Candidates then work directly with us and designate your organization as the recipient of WES Evaluation Reports.

acf.intro_text: Working with WES is simple and requires no contract or commitment. Academic institutions, employers and other organizations refer their candidates to WES for credential evaluation services just as they would for admissions testing or other external services. Candidates then work directly with us and designate your organization as the recipient of WES Evaluation Reports.
acf.intro_item_text:
Regional directors and our Academic Services team are ready to assist institutional staff with any questions regarding our credential evaluation services and other WES resources.

Download the WES services flyer for more information.
acf.main_content_item_1_headline: How to Link Your Website to WES
acf.main_content_item_1_text: You can direct candidates to WES for credential evaluation services by providing a link on your international application page. Click the button below to access code you can add to your website, or contact us for assistance.
acf.main_content_item_2_text:
WES has developed tools that our partners can use to:

  • Streamline their international student application processes
  • Quickly assess whether applicant credentials meet basic admission criteria
  • Gain access to information on other countries’ educational systems
